title: 88/100/EEC: Commission Decision of 12 January 1988 approving a programme for the fresh flowers, fruits and vegetables sector (producers'markets) in Portugal pursuant to Council Regulation (EEC) No 355/77 (Only the Portuguese text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 12 January 1988
approving a programme for the fresh flowers, fruits and vegetables sector (producers' markets) in Portugal pursuant to Council Regulation  (EEC) No 355/77
(Only the Portuguese text is authentic)
(88/100/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The programme for the producers' markets for flowers, fruits and vegetables in Portugal forwarded by the Portuguese Government on 20 July 1987 and for which additional information was provided on 10 November pursuant to Regulation (EEC) No 355/77 is approved.
This Decision is addressed to the Portuguese Republic.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 12 January 1988.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 51, 23. 2. 1977, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 57, 27. 2. 1987, p. 6.
